unnormalised: I remember when my friend Rohan, who works at TCS, told me they're using AI to automate code reviews. He said they've cut down the time by 60% using some new ML model.
normalised: I remember when my friend Rohan, who works at T-C-S, told me they are using A-I to automate code reviews. He said they have cut down the time by sixty percent using some new M-L model.
